text: Kelly Bowen (born 7 August 1989) is an Australian professional basketball player. ==Career== ===College=== From 2008–2012, Bowen played for the Gonzaga Bulldogs located in Spokane, Washington. Participating in the NCAA's Division I and primarily in the West Coast Conference. During her time there, she played alongside Courtney Vandersloot. ===WNBL=== After a successful college career in the United States, Bowen began her WNBL career in Queensland, with the Townsville Fire. After a one-year absence, she returned home to Victoria, with the rebranded, Melbourne Boomers. She then moved to the Adelaide Lightning, where she would be co-captain alongside Leilani Mitchell. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Australian women's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia) Category:Townsville Fire players Category:Adelaide Lightning players Category:Melbourne Boomers players
title: Kelly Bowen
